means: 积极的，活跃的，有生气的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"积极的，活跃的"之意。
means: active ：指有活动能力，强调与消极或休止相反的积极活动状态。
energetic ：提精力充沛、奋力从事某事业。
vigorous ：指不仅表现积极、有生气，而且固有精力和活力十分旺盛。
brisk ：指动作敏捷、充满活力、轻快活泼地从事某项工作或活动。
lively ：侧重支轮船快，机智，有生气。

word_mean: 有效的，活性的，非被动的，积极的，非期待的

sentence.Network_en: In April 1944 he was killed on active service.
His daughter was very active and noisy in the mornings.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的女儿一到上午就很好动，吵吵闹闹的。

sentence.Network_en: An active and expansive market economy is a necessary condition for progress.
sentence.Network_cn: 积极扩张的市场经济是发展的必要条件。

means.word_mean: 活跃的;活泼的
其他释义
有活动力的;积极的;主动的;现行的
其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'preferring action to contemplation'): from Latin activus, from act- 'done', from the verb agere

entry.def: Someone who is active moves around a lot or does a lot of things.

example.ex: Having an active youngster about the house can be quite wearing.
example.tran: 家里有个好动的小孩会是相当累人的。

entry.def: If you have an active mind or imagination, you are always thinking of new things.

example.ex: ...the tragedy of an active mind trapped by failing physical health.
example.tran: 因为健康状况衰退而思维受阻的悲剧

entry.def: If someone is active in an organization, cause, or campaign, they do things for it rather than just giving it their support.

example.ex: ...a chance for fathers to play a more active role in childcare...
example.tran: 让父亲们更积极地参与育婴的机会

example.ex: I am an active member of the Conservative Party...
example.tran: 我是保守党的积极分子。

entry.def: Active is used to emphasize that someone is taking action in order to achieve something, rather than just hoping for it or achieving it in an indirect way.

example.ex: Companies need to take active steps to increase exports.
example.tran: 各公司需要采取积极措施增加出口。

entry.def: If you say that a person or animal is active in a particular place or at a particular time, you mean that they are performing their usual activities or performing a particular activity.

example.ex: Guerrilla groups are active in the province.

entry.def: An active volcano has erupted recently or is expected to erupt quite soon.

entry.tran: 起化学(或生物)作用的;活性的;有效的
entry.def: An active substance has a chemical or biological effect on things.

example.ex: The active ingredient in some of the mouthwashes was simply detergent.
example.tran: 某些漱口剂中的有效成分只不过是洗涤剂而已。

entry.def: In grammar, the active or the active voice means the forms of a verb which are used when the subject refers to a person or thing that does something. For example, in 'I saw her yesterday', the verb is in the active.

means.word_mean: 1. chemical agent capable of activity
2. the voice used to indicate that the grammatical subject of the verb is performing the action or causing the happening denoted by the verb;

sentences.sentence: "`The boy threw the ball' uses the active voice"

means.word_mean: 3. a person devoted to the active life
1. tending to become more severe or wider in scope;
2. engaged in or ready for military or naval operations;
3. disposed to take action or effectuate change;

sentences.sentence: "a director who takes an active interest in corporate operations"
"he was active in drawing attention to their grievances"

means.word_mean: 4. taking part in an activity;
5. characterized by energetic activity;

sentences.sentence: "an active man is a man of action"

means.word_mean: 6. exerting influence or producing an effect;
7. full of activity or engaged in continuous activity;
8. in operation;
9. of the sun; characterized by a high level activity in sunspots and flares and radio emissions
10. expressing that the subject of the sentence has the semantic function of actor: "Hemingway favors active constructions"
11. expressing action rather than a state of being; used of verbs (e.g. `to run') and participial adjectives (e.g. `running' in `running water')
12. (of e.g. volcanos) erupting or liable to erupt;
13. producing activity or change
14. engaged in full-time work;

sentences.sentence: "though past retirement age he is still active in his profession"

means.word_mean: 15. being in physical motion;
16. characterized by energetic bodily activity;

auth_sentence.content: Both said Iraq did not have any active WMD.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both said Iraq did not have any active WMD.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both said Iraq did not have any active WMD.

auth_sentence.content: He also said Saddam Hussein had no active WMD.
auth_sentence.res_content: He also said Saddam Hussein had no active WMD.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He also said Saddam Hussein had no active WMD.

auth_sentence.content: Though retired from Xinhua, Yang is still active.
auth_sentence.res_content: Though retired from Xinhua, Yang is still active.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Though retired from Xinhua, Yang is still active.

stems_affixes.word_buile: act行动,活动,做+ing……的→adj.代理的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的

exact[v.强求;精确的]+ing……的→adj.苛求的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 反应的, 起反作用的, 反动的, 电抗性的

act行动,活动,做→v.行动,行为,扮演 n.[戏]幕

stems_affixes.value_cn: 动作, 作用, 战斗, 行动, 举动, 行为
stems_affixes.word_buile: act活动+ion动作或状态→动作,活动
act行动,活动,做+ivity特性→活动
in不+activity活跃→n.不活跃

stems_affixes.value_cn: 反应, 反作用, 反动[力]
stems_affixes.word_buile: react反应;反抗+ion动作或状态→n.反应, 反作用, 反动[力]
react反应+or物器→n.反应堆
act行动,活动,做→v.行动,行为,扮演 n.[戏]幕
act行动,活动,做+ivate使→使……活动
actual实际的+ize化→实际化→实现
counter反+act行动,活动,做→反着动→力量对抗→抵消
en使+act行动,活动,做→使[法律]动→实施法律
ex出+act行动,活动,做→[要求]做出来→强求
inter相互+act行动,活动,做→相互动→相互作用
re反+act行动,活动,做→反动;反应
trans横+act行动,活动,做→横向动→互相贸易或交易

Sentence.sentence: It was the most active sector of American economy.
What we want to encourage in these students is an active intellectual experience, in which they develop the wide range of complex reasoning abilities required of good lawyers
The experience at Duke University may ease some concerns because the students have used iPods for active interactions .

means.word_mean: 活泼的, 活跃的; 积极的
起作用的

sentences.en: His pulse is low, but his heart is still active.
sentences.cn: 他脉搏很弱, 但心脏还跳着。

means.word_mean: 主动的

sentences.en: This sentence is in the active voice.
sentences.cn: 本句子用的是主动语态。

jushi.english: The cat is an active animal.
This sentence is in the acvite voice.
